page.title: 10 Oxfam Oxford
page.content: Oxfam is one of the main organisations for famine relief.Last year,1984,along with Blue Peter it raised over 50,000 pounds.It raises money by setting-up shops in different parts of the world where they sell second-hand clothes,shoes,books,records jewellery and so on. Last year they raised money for Ethiopia and this year they're looking into raising money for Bangladesh in India.More than 25% of the money they bring in for famine relief is donated by the public.Some people just send in money,others organise fund-raising events. Oxfam originally started in Oxford in 1942 and has been going ever since.It has now become international.Oxford has the main Oxfam office up in Summertown.In fact they have three different shops and offices in Oxford.
